channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Slimstat Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Slimstat Analytics

item.title: CVE-2022-4310|2024-08-03T01:34:50.117Z -- unknown -- slimstat%20analytics
item.description: The Slimstat Analytics WordPress plugin before 4.9.3 does not sanitise and escape the URI when logging requests, which could allow unauthenticated attackers to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks against logged in admin viewing the logs
